title: Did the Irish Times column express "pity " in favour of the United States?
subtitle: An opinion column was copied and pasted and then circulated on the Internet, prompting some to question its validity.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Irish Times published a column of Ventin Outol expressing "pity" to the United States over the leadership of United States President Donald Trump during the COVID-19 epidemic.
